name: The Standard
description:
Comes with small side of Haus fries
Burger w/ Gouda cheese, lettuce, tomato, red onion, Haus sauce
Haus Sauce is signature sauce of kraut, ketchup, dijonaise, and brown mustard

name: Farm Haus
description:
Comes with small side of Haus fries
Burger, Cheddar cheese, country ham, applewood-smoked bacon, farm egg

name: Bavarian
description:
Comes with small side of Haus fries
Pretzel bun, burger, Haus-made beer cheese, bacon and fried onions
